alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 2:23PM CDT until June 10 at 7:18AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Chillicothe affecting Linn MO and Livingston Counties. Wakenda Creek at Carrollton affecting Carroll County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Grand River near Pattonsburg affecting Daviess and Gentry Counties. Grand River near Sumner affecting Linn MO, Chariton, Livingston and Carroll Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wakenda Creek at Carrollton. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying undeveloped areas along the creek begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 16.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Thu 7pm 7am 7pm Wakenda Creek Carrollton 16.0 15.0 Wed 2pm 15.5 16.1 11.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
